title: Uneven player numbers in ranked
body:
Yeah if we could like maybe idk, not lose lp if a team member doesn't connect to the game ever or something along those lines that'd be great RIOT, really any kind of system that helps to not demerit the team if they have under 5 players before a certain time would be really lovely, just a thought.

P.S.

This is mostly me being salty due to (obviously) having team members that never connect to the game but I don't think it's a bad idea anyway.

replies.body: If you can find a way to prove that a player is having legitimate connection issues and not leaving due to being counter-picked, then Riot would be more than happy to implement this.
